name: Walsh et ux., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Suburban Water Company
name_abbreviation: Walsh v. Philadelphia Suburban Water Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
parties: Walsh et ux., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Suburban Water Company.
attorneys: Stephen A. Cozen, with him Sydney C. Orlofsky, Harold W. Spencer, and Orlofsky and Cozen, and Wright, Speneer, Manning & Sagendorph, for appellants.
Stephen G. Yusem, with him Victor J. Roberts, and High, Swartz, Roberts & Seidel, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Walsh et ux., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Suburban Water Company.
Argued April 29, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Stephen A. Cozen, with him Sydney C. Orlofsky, Harold W. Spencer, and Orlofsky and Cozen, and Wright, Speneer, Manning & Sagendorph, for appellants.
Stephen G. Yusem, with him Victor J. Roberts, and High, Swartz, Roberts & Seidel, for appellee.
June 27, 1969:
